item.description:
** Update **

Anyone interested in going to see "The Expendables"? I would like to plan the meet up for August 20, 2010 at 7:30 at the Rave Motion Pictures Buckland Hills 18 + IMAX movie theater in Manchester.

We can meet in the lobby of the theater at 7:15. Here is my cell phome number if you are having trouble finding me. (860) 655-3756.

Also, have a preference where we would like to meet afterward? There are plenty of places in the area.

If you are a fan of action movies, you most likely will like this. Also the critics gave it a solid review.

the cast includes

Sylvester Stallone
Jason Statham
Jet Li
Dolph Lundgren
Mickey Rourke
Randy Couture
Terry Crews
Eric Roberts
Stone Cold Steve Austin
David Zayas
Gary Daniels
Bruce Willis
and
Arnold Schwarzenegger
item.how_to_find_us: We will meeting in the lobby before the movie. Here is my Cell phone number if you need to reach me (860) 655-3756
item.name: The Expendables and get together after for drinks.
